item.description: About me I just earned my Ph.D. degree working with my advisor Prof. Chris Marianetti on Thermodynamics of Interacting Phonons at Columbia University. We are currently developing a highly optimized software that executes the methodologies described in the paper we published. It will be released soon. Stay tuned.
